InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S1 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 1

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. This special VariPuck will accept any weapon the same size as the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-117 Bulldog Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 1

Featuring a three-barrel sequential fire design, the Klaus & Werner CF-117 Bulldog laser repeater is capable of delivering high velocity energy rounds while maintaining heat efficiency making it a favorite among new pilots who are outfitting their first ship.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-111 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 1
Missiles: 1xS1

Behring’s MSD-111 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 1 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of one S1 missile.

InstalledItem.Name: Marksman I Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 1

Behring's Marksman series of proximity missiles has earned as much of a reputation for its ability to track a wide range of heat signatures as it has for its area-effect proximity damage.

InstalledItem.Name: Omnisky III Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Amon & Reese Co.
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 1

The Omnisky III is the base model in A&R's line of laser autocannons for small ships and has a comparable rate of fire, damage output and range to other weapons in its size class. It uses mid-grade components in its design, offering a marked increase in power efficiency over some of its less expensive competitors.

InstalledItem.Name: Shimmer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Ascension Astro
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Stealth

Ascension Astro is known for one thing — quality stealth components. Their Shimmer shield generator was built not only to help avoid detection, but also provide protection when needed most.

InstalledItem.Name: Regulus
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

The Regulus is the power plant you can count on when everyone is counting on you. Made to exceed exacting military standards, Aegis’ design team has made sure that you have the extra power you need, when you need it most.

InstalledItem.Name: Bracer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

For those looking for a solid, dependable mid-line cooler, you can’t do much better than Aegis’ Bracer. This small-frame cooler system offers solid performance and durability to keep your ship firing on all cylinders.
